themes: equitable inclusion of all artists and organizations
concerns about disproportionate funding to inexperienced artists
need for clear and responsible budgeting
comparison to national arts funding standards
recognition of professional achievement in funding decisions
key_phrases: funding requirements must be balanced to include all artists and arts organizations
Distribute funding according to a clear and responsible budget
Inexperienced artists receiving $80,000 in funding is absurd
Austin arts funding distribution should be in scale with standard arts practices
barriers_identified: lack of consideration for professional achievement
solutions_proposed: balance funding requirements to include all artists and organizations
distribute funding according to a clear and responsible budget
align Austin arts funding distribution with standard arts practices
